resources.string: The app will remember everyone who you\'ve come into contact with (so long as they have the app). You can safely use other apps whilst this is running.
We\'ll let you know if you\'ve come into contact with anyone, who has reported symptoms on their app.
You have reported symptoms within the past 14 days. Please self-isolate until the 14 days is over, to help save lives.
Have you experienced any of these symptoms?
A high temperature – this means you feel hot to touch on your chest or back (you do not need to measure your temperature).
A new, continuous cough – this means coughing a lot for more than an hour, or 3 or more coughing episodes in 24 hours (if you usually have a cough, it may be worse than usual).
You may still have Coronavirus - many people won\'t show symptoms for the first 5 days.
You are displaying symptoms of Coronavirus

When you click 'ok', everyone who you have come into contact with over the past 5 days, will be told to self-isolate. 

Don't worry - they won't be told who you are, or when they came into contact with you. 

You will also need to self-isolate yourself for 14 days.
